md:
giải nghĩa từ "really" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.
1. Really (adverb) - thực sự, thật sự
	* Meaning: used to emphasize the truth or reality of something
	* Example: "I'm really tired today." (Tôi thực sự mệt mỏi hôm nay.)
	* Related words: actually, truly, genuinely
2. Really (adverb) - rất, cực kỳ
	* Meaning: used to emphasize the degree or extent of something
	* Example: "This cake is really delicious." (Bánh này rất ngon.)
	* Related words: extremely, very, highly
3. Really (interjection) - thực sự, thật sự
	* Meaning: used to express surprise, excitement, or skepticism
	* Example: "Really? I didn't know that!" (Thực sự? Tôi không biết điều đó!)
	* Related words: wow, amazing, unbelievable

Note: Depending on the context, "really" can have different meanings and connotations. In general, it is used to add emphasis or express strong feelings about something.

(Bánh này rất ngon.) * Related words: extremely, very, highly 3. Really (interjection) - thực sự, thật sự * Meaning: used to express surprise, excitement, or skepticism * Example: "Really? I didn't know that!" (Thực sự? Tôi không biết điều đó!) * Related words: wow, amazing, unbelievable

Note: Depending on the context, "really" can have different meanings and connotations. In general, it is used to add emphasis or express strong feelings about something.
